sentences.en: New industries demanded skilled labour not available locally.
sentences.cn: 新兴产业需要熟练技术工人，而当地没有。

sentences.en: We've got cards which are drawn and printed and designed by someone locally.
sentences.cn: 我们得到了由某人在当地绘制、印刷和设计的纸牌。

sentences.en: Locally a fort had two kinds of impact.
sentences.cn: 在当地，堡垒有两种影响。
